chance_cards.description: Advance to Illinois Ave. If you pass Go, collect $200.
Advance to St. Charles Place. If you pass Go, collect $200.
Advance token to the nearest Utility. If unowned, you may buy it. If owned, pay owner 10 times the dice roll.
Advance to the nearest Railroad. Pay owner twice the rental to which they are otherwise entitled. If Railroad is unowned, you may buy it.
Bank pays you a dividend of $50.
Get Out of Jail Free. This card may be kept until needed or sold.
Go to Jail. Move directly to Jail. Do not pass Go. Do not collect $200.
Make general repairs on all your property. Pay $25 for each house and $100 for each hotel you own.
Take a trip to Reading Railroad. If you pass Go, collect $200.
Take a walk on the Boardwalk. Advance token to Boardwalk.
You have been elected Chairman of the Board. Pay each player $50.
Your building and loan matures. Collect $150.
You have won a crossword competition. Collect $100.
